text: Dyanne Thorne (October 14, 1936 â€“ January 28, 2020) was an American actress, stage performer and singer. She was known for her stage work in Las Vegas and as the lead actress in the Ilsa movie franchise of the 1970s. Her movie roles include Ilsa, She Wolf of the SS, Chesty Anderson, USN and Hellhole. Thorne was born in Greenwich, Connecticut. Thorne died on January 28, 2020 in Las Vegas, Nevada from pancreatic cancer at the age of 83.In Loving Memory of Dyanne Thorne ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:Singers from Las Vegas Category:Actors from Las Vegas Category:Singers from Connecticut Category:American movie actors Category:Models from Nevada Category:Actors from Greenwich, Connecticut Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths
title: Dyanne Thorne
